summary: Frontend testing completed for new features: AI Chatbot, Bookings page tabs, Reviews page tabs, Notifications page. All features working correctly. Fixed missing chat translation keys in en_US.json.
passed_tests: AI Chatbot - Chat bubble visible on home page
AI Chatbot - Chat widget opens on click
AI Chatbot - AI response received successfully
AI Chatbot - Translations now showing correctly (Chat Support, Always available, Type your message...)

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Missing chat translation keys causing raw keys to display (chat.title, chat.available, chat.welcome_message, chat.placeholder, chat.disclaimer, etc.)
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added complete 'chat' section with all required translation keys
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Chat widget was showing raw translation keys instead of proper text

context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) AI Chatbot using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini via Emergent LLM key - chat bubble visible on all authenticated pages, opens chat widget, sends messages and receives AI responses. Fixed missing translation keys for chat widget. 2) Bookings page has 4 tabs (Upcoming, Past, Rescheduled, Cancelled) all working. 3) Reviews page has 2 tabs (Pending, Submitted) both working. 4) Notifications page loads and displays notifications correctly with unread indicators.
